content: It seems that most readers on this site are supportive of the DOE sponsoring a program that aims to develop empathy for both Muslims and Islam. If you take an honest look at it, most observers would have to conclude that this is not merely an academic look at the sociology of Muslims or a history of the Islamic religion. From the responses I have read here, many people identifying as progressive harbor some degree of hatred toward Christians. Do you think that is based more on knowledge or on ignorance? Where is the empathy for sincere Christians?
